task: Rate usefulness as a real frustrated business user in realistic multi-turn sourcing conversations.

reasons: Assistant never provides concrete company names despite 4 turns of specific requests
Turn 3 is a complete generic fallback - describes 'Candidate A/B/C' instead of real companies
User explicitly asked for shortlist of 3-5 manufacturers, got abstract templates instead
No continuity between turns - each response starts over with generic advice
criticalIssues: Generic fallback after user gave concrete constraints (manufacturers, men's classic shoes, Minsk)
No actual company data returned in any turn
Template-style response instead of actionable shortlist
strengths: Maintained correct location (Minsk) and product focus (men's classic shoes)
Email template in turn 4 was structurally sound
ratings.nextUserProbe: Почему вы не даете конкретные названия компаний? У вас вообще есть данные о производителях?

reasons: Turn 2 provides genuinely useful quality criteria framework for flour selection
Turn 4 checklist is practical and comprehensive for pre-contract verification
Turn 3 shortlist is abstract ('Candidate A/B/C') without concrete company names
Assistant admits data limitations honestly but falls back to generic templates
criticalIssues: Generic fallback in turn 3 - no actual flour mills named despite explicit request
No export-ready company identification provided as requested in turn 3
strengths: Quality criteria in turn 2 are actionable and industry-relevant
Document checklist in turn 4 is complete and practical
ratings.nextUserProbe: Можете хотя бы 2-3 реальных названия мельниц дать, которые точно работают на экспорт?

reasons: Successfully pivots from consumer question to B2B format without breaking
Turn 2 provides relevant category paths for HoReCa suppliers
Turn 3 gives 3 concrete search query variants as requested
criticalIssues: Turn 3 company list is completely irrelevant (auto center, fishing shop, bathroom fixtures) - appears to be random data
No actual food suppliers identified despite the context
strengths: Good continuity across turns - maintains Minsk/Uruchye context
Successfully bridges consumer intent to B2B search strategy
Search query formulations are practical and specific
ratings.nextUserProbe: А можете конкретные компании по поставке продуктов для кафе подсказать, а не общие запросы?

reasons: Turn 3 shortlist is completely wrong - returns computer institute, medical equipment, and car company for juicer manufacturers
No relevant companies found for any turn despite specific OEM/ODM request
Turn 4 RFQ template is generic and not tailored to juicer manufacturing specifics
criticalIssues: Completely irrelevant company suggestions (NIEVM computers, medical equipment, cars) - shows no understanding of query
Generic fallback to search advice instead of concrete progress
No acknowledgment that returned companies are irrelevant to juicers
strengths: Turn 2 provides relevant search terms for OEM/ODM manufacturing
RFQ template structure is technically correct
ratings.nextUserProbe: Вы предлагаете мне звонить в компьютерный НИИ за соковыжималками? Это какая-то ошибка?

reasons: Turn 1 and 2 provide good search strategy and category guidance
Turn 3 falls back to generic 'Candidate A/B/C' format instead of naming actual exporters
Turn 4 outreach templates are professional and complete
Maintains correct focus on EAEU/CIS + dairy/confectionery segments
criticalIssues: Turn 3 is generic fallback - describes archetypes instead of real companies
No concrete exporter names provided despite 3 turns of narrowing criteria
strengths: Good search strategy guidance in turns 1-2
Templates in turn 4 are practical and export-focused
Maintains segment and market context correctly
ratings.nextUserProbe: Назовите хотя бы одну реальную компанию, которая экспортирует молочку в Россию или Казахстан
